translations: 侵略者（aggressor 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Partition would give licence to other aggressors in other conflicts.
sentences.translation: 分裂组织给其他侵略者提供其他冲突的借口。

sentences.sentence: Their feet will trample on the dead bodies of their perfidious aggressors.
sentences.translation: 他们将从背信弃义的侵略者的尸体上踏过。

sentences.sentence: They have been the aggressors in this conflict.
sentences.translation: 他们一直是这场冲突中的挑衅者。
